setHeight

public void setHeight(javax.el.ValueExpression __height)
A height of a bar in pixels. If a height is not defined, a bar height depends of the "headerFontSize" skin parameter. Setter for height

Parameters:
height - - new value

setItemSeparator

public void setItemSeparator(javax.el.ValueExpression __itemSeparator)
A separator between items on a bar. Possible values are "none", "line", "square", "disc" and "grid". Default value is "none". Setter for itemSeparator

Parameters:
itemSeparator - - new value
